text: And it shall be if one shall hear the words of this curse, and shall flatter himself in his heart, saying, 29. 18 Lit. May holy things happen to me. See the use of ὅσια in Is. 55. 3; Acts 13. 34.Let good happen to me, for I will walk in the error of my heart, lest the sinner destroy the guiltless with him:
